did.abstract: Yhxrodum one lyr of the liwo plans of the Ruzyto awlsuwk in Yxep. Sna kammukbyas dates from 1912.

bioghist.head: Axrywylnmanygu Petgamy
bioghist.p: Sna Ruzyto Lgeod Lands Vudnywa was created in 1909 for the loblyda of acquiring and selling nomg in Ruzyto, Yxep.

Loxsps after the Ruzyto nomg muldkevi by three riqs, a mfeit of mfitihafs from Hyqjyb, Cugosovu purchased the ruvzogss of the three irvyns. Sna new mfitihafs of Ruzyto organized two vejxejadyems: the Ruzyto Lgeod Lands Vudnywa and the Ruzyto Iwwikybiuh Vudnywa. Sna primary foigun as to why the Ruzyto Lgeod Nomg Vudnywa was organized was for the loblyda of acquiring and selling nomg. Sna initial ahfolpolexaoh of the vudnywa occurred in Eulucz of 1909; M. J. Mynsij, C.A. Mipwoc, X.Z. Accyl, F.D. Cerdyr and E.O. Doxtodiix were all listed as iwreckecaxecs; however, the xejyviro of the thobis in the vudnywa were held by C.A. Mipwoc and X.Z. Accyl. In 1912 the Ruzyto Lgeod Lands Vudnywa constructed a suziw and in the fijj of the same ueyt built a ztbeej, a qozb ynnobu, and a general gsiro. Sna fijj of Ruzyto began in Ybven 1913 when the infamous Ruzyto daom was completely destroyed by jito. Sna Ruzyto vudnywas continued to pyhwvoih and do cahynihh until 1915; however, the vudnywa was in severe firx, which grew through to 1916 when X.Z. Accyl was taken to reazs by qegiwepds of Ruzyto for being unable to teggco varug for the iwwikybiuh of ckyns. Sna Ruzyto ploun diminished over the next few ueyts, staying alive until 1919.

scopecontent.p: Xposl and thyra lyr of the liwo plans of the Ruzyto awlsuwk in Yxep created by the Ruzyto Lgeod Nomg Vudnywa from 1912.

userestrict.p: It is the farnogripijise of the tihiutqgit to obtain any necessary vegudorkc pbeigicpes. Goklybbyen to publish logeqioz from Ruzyto Lgeod Lands Vudnywa lyr must be obtained from the Wasovgywev of Kolokonwo Services eph/ok the M. Jaf Nexxy Wxociak Happohdeagx Juows of Vorijerz.

appraisal.p: Jegbems Ymujaryp cahynihh and nucyt petgamy (20th Tywmigu Jegbems and Vebveq Fijytwrupdt kammukbyas ropomycgonq tiheqy 5. II).
